name: Monster Brawl
description:
A monster was born to kill and destroy!

In the city full of chaos and other monsters, your goal is easy! Survive!

In order to do so, you have to earn exp. to become stronger by destroying the cars, trees and even buildings. You can also kill other monsters smaller than you in this dog-eat-dog world!

To be the Top No.1 in the Leaderboard by the end of each round and DOMINATE the game! Alright warriors! Time to brawl!

Features:
* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime
* Simple rules but very attractive
* Lots of interesting challenges
* Beat other players and stay alive
